bug.short_desc: [audit] prevents virtual machine from starting up in GNOME Boxes
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: After installing the latest stable updates released for Fedora 24, launching a virtual machine in GNOME Boxes fails with error messages like:
"(gnome-boxes:2928): Boxes-WARNING **: machine.vala:606: Failed to start Fedora 25: Unable to start domain: Failed to connect socket to '/run/user/1000/libvirt/virtlogd-sock': No such file or directory".
However, all related services seem to be up and running as expected.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): audit-2.6.1-1.fc24
How reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Update system running Fedora 24 with the latest stable updates and reboot system. 2. Launch virtual machine in GNOME Boxes.
Actual results: Virtual machine fails to start up.
Expected results: Virtual machine starts up successfully.
Additional info: Downgrade to audit-2.5.2-1.fc24 pulled in by executing 'dnf downgrade audit' restores normal behaviour.

I bumped into the same problem. And the suggested fix (downgrading audit) worked for me (after a reboot).
It might be related to the bug mentioned at: https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1351995
Fixed in upstream commit 1304. A new audit package will be released shortly.
*** Bug 1352066 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
audit-2.6.2-1.fc23 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 23. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-bf659f2cf3
audit-2.6.2-1.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-afa82d90dd

audit-2.6.2-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-afa82d90dd

audit-2.6.2-1.fc23 has been pushed to the Fedora 23 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-bf659f2cf3
audit-2.6.2-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
*** Bug 1352194 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
